name: Sari Braid Tote Bag- blue
description:
Re-cycled sari braid and a women on a machine- look what our workshop has made. 

Very stylish and versatile tote bag.
Sturdy handles from hand spun, handloom cotton fabric; woven locally.

Size 33 x 43 cm [13 " x 16.5"] 
handles long enough to loop over your should or carry by hand.
Enjoy

Introductory sale price.
Postage free from our workshop.

name: Little Purse
description:
Little purses, 
handy for small change, sewing kits, makeup...and just so cute- reminds me of being a kid.
Indigo dyed, mud resist block print with lots and lots of hand stitch.

Size 10cm /4" across the 'mouth'

FREE SHIPPING from our workshop to you.

Sorry- this is so weird...what ever I do picture is loaded sideways! 

Irregularities in print, weave, embroidery and colour are inherent characteristics of hand crafted textiles

name: Placemats- set of 4
description:
Re-cycled silk saris + rope + lots of stitch= bright cheerful placemats 

Easy to spot clean.

Size 12 " or 30 cm

SHIPPING IS FREE when ordering directly from our workshop.

Handstitch by Santosh. 
Each piece is totally unique in a small way -Irregularities in print, weave, embroidery and colour are inherent characteristics and part of the charm of hand crafted and/or re-cycled textiles

name: Patchwork Quilt #21/4
description:
Hand spun + hand weave cotton + hand block print + hand stitch = Quilt.
A combination of traditional methods and contemporary design to create a quilt that will be treasured for many years.

Size 186 x186 cm [ 6x6 ‘]

Unbleached cotton , permanent pigment ink printing- cold water gentle hand wash, dry in shade.
SHIPPING IS FREE when ordering directly from our workshop.

Hand stitch by Mrs Mia and Indira, Machine by Shaquil.
Each hand stitched quilt is uniquely numbered as part of our collection.
Each piece fairly made and totally unique in a small way -Irregularities in print, weave, embroidery and colour are inherent characteristics and part of the charm of hand crafted and/or re-cycled textiles

name: Bias Drape Vest #2
description:
Re-cycled silk saris + hand stitch = luscious vest.

Great for Lagenlook layering in summer or winter, completely reversible to compliment many outfits.

For stories of our workshop take a peek at our blog www.ofdaydreamsandmemories.blogspot.in

Many colours to choose from- contact us.

SHIPPING IS FREE when ordering directly from our workshop.

Each piece is fairly made and totally unique in a small way -Irregularities in print, weave, embroidery and colour are inherent characteristics and part of the charm of hand crafted and/or re-cycled textiles
Hand stitch by-Kashish            Machine work by-Shaquil

Code PD55 sized to fit 
Small- Bust:92cm/36in to 96cm/38in Hips:98cm/39in to 102cm/41in 
Medium- Bust:100cm/40in to 104cm/42in Hips:106cm/43in to 110cm/45in 
Large- Bust:108cm/42in to 112cm/44in Hips:110cm/45in to 112cm/47in

name: Squares Jacket- #5
description:
Semi-fitted reversible  hip length jacket with an open front.

Made from a layer of re-cycled sari silk and  a reverse of medium weight cotton [hand-woven at Barefoot College]  and lots and lots of hand stitch…this is a piece to layer over a sweater for winter or use as a topper on a balmy summer evening; always elegant, always exotic.

Many colours to choose from- contact us.

SHIPPING IS FREE when ordering directly from our workshop.

Hand stitch by Usha, Machine by Papu-ji
Each piece fairly made and totally unique in a small way -Irregularities in print, weave, embroidery and colour are inherent characteristics and part of the charm of hand crafted and/or re-cycled textiles
